search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for myRealPage (myrealpage.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for myRealPage can be found here: [https://www.myrealpage.com/pricing](https://www.myrealpage.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: myRealPage Pricing - Real Estate Agent Websites Made Easy

extracted_content.content:
Get Started with myRealPage
---------------------------

Whether you need a single agent website, listings for WordPress or a broker website, myRealPage has a solution to help your business.

Only $59 a month

\+ taxes and board fees for certain boards\*

*   No Contracts
*   Cancel Anytime
*   16 hrs / 7 days Support

Summary of our set of features
------------------------------

Simple Website Builder

*   Easy to Use Modern Editor
*   Ample selection of layouts
*   Modern, swappable Themes
*   Unlimited Pages
*   Library of prebuilt, niche specific pages
*   Unlimited Website Storage
*   Staging Area

MLS® Listings Search & IDX

*   Best in Class MLS® Listings Search
*   Unlimited Predefined Searches
*   Sold Listings Data Access\*
*   Built-In Quick Search Tools
*   SEO Friendly URLs
*   QR Code Generation
*   Ability to Lock Listings for Sign Up

Social Media + Print Media

*   Integrated Facebook Post / Stories
*   Integrated Instagram Post / Stories
*   Integrated Twitter Post / Stories
*   Integrated Feature Sheet
*   Integrated Postcards
*   Brand-Specific Social Media Templates
*   Ability to create your own Templates

Lead Capture Tools

*   VOW (Virtual Office Website)
*   MLS® Email Alerts for Leads
*   Built-In Lead Gen Forms
*   Import / Export of Contacts
*   Third Party CRM Connection
*   Lead Management Module

Search Engine Optimization

*   Easy Access to Meta Tags
*   FREE SSL Certificate (HTTPS)
*   Automated Google Sitemaps
*   Google Analytics Integration
*   Google Search Suite Compatible
*   Editable Robots.txt

Broker Suite

*   Minimal Setup Required
*   Robust Agent Directory
*   Agents Listings Section
*   Leads directed to the correct agent
*   Featured Agent Widget
*   Add as many agents as needed

\*Available in Select Markets

Frequently Asked  
Questions
----------------------------

Haven’t found the answer to your needs or have a few questions before getting started? Try clicking these questions.

You can cancel anytime. There are no minimum amount of months. Once you process the cancellation form, your website will be active until the next invoice due date.

#### Testimonials

What Our Clients Are Saying
---------------------------

*   ![Image 1: Rob Campbell Testimonial](https://myrealpage.com/wp-content/uploads/rob-campbell-testimonial-template-mrp.png)
    
*   ![Image 2: Richard Whitney Testimonial](https://myrealpage.com/wp-content/uploads/richard-whitney-testimonial-template-mrp.png)
    
*   ![Image 3: James Hampton Testimonial](https://myrealpage.com/wp-content/uploads/james-1.png)
    
*   ![Image 4: Aarun SandhuTestimonial](https://myrealpage.com/wp-content/uploads/aaron-1.png)
    
*   ![Image 5: AJ Cheema Testimonial](https://myrealpage.com/wp-content/uploads/aj-1.png)
    
*   ![Image 6: Norm Fisher Testimonial](https://myrealpage.com/wp-content/uploads/norm-1.png)
    
*   ![Image 7: Heather Kelly Testimonial](https://myrealpage.com/wp-content/uploads/heather-1.png)
    
*   ![Image 8: Matt Emerson Testimonial 2](https://myrealpage.com/wp-content/uploads/matt-1.png)
    

### Trusted By Over12,000+

REALTORS® From These World-Class Brokerages

![Image 9](https://myrealpage.com/wp-content/uploads/remax-hp.png)

![Image 10](https://myrealpage.com/wp-content/uploads/sutton-hp.png)

![Image 11](https://myrealpage.com/wp-content/uploads/macdonald-hp.png)

![Image 12](https://myrealpage.com/wp-content/uploads/c-21-hp-300x141.png)

![Image 13](https://myrealpage.com/wp-content/uploads/realty-hp.png)

![Image 14](https://myrealpage.com/wp-content/uploads/homelife-hp.png)

### Create your website today  
with myRealPage

No Contracts. No Lock-Ins. No Fuss.

Create fantastic-looking REALTOR® Websites in minutes without being a techie. Trusted by over 12,000 REALTORS® from world-class brokerages.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes additional taxes and board fees for certain boards.
